verses.verse: And I saw<WG3708> in the right<WG1188> hand<WG1188> of Him who sat<WG2521> on the throne<WG2362> a book<WG975> written<WG1125> inside<WG2081> and on the back,<WG3693> sealed<WG2696> up with seven<WG2033> seals.<WG4973>

And I saw<WG3708> a strong<WG2478> angel<WG32> proclaiming<WG2784> with a loud<WG3173> voice,<WG5456> "Who<WG5101> is worthy<WG514> to open<WG455> the book<WG975> and to break<WG3089> its seals<WG4973>?"

And no<WG3762> one<WG3762> in heaven,<WG3772> or<WG3761> on the earth,<WG1093> or<WG3761> under<WG5270> the earth,<WG1093> was able<WG1410> to open<WG455> the book,<WG975> or<WG3777> to look<WG991> into it.
And I [began] to weep<WG2799> greatly,<WG4183> because<WG3754> no<WG3762> one<WG3762> was found<WG2147> worthy<WG514> to open<WG455> the book,<WG975> or<WG3777> to look<WG991> into it;

and one<WG1520> of the elders<WG4245> said<WG3004> to me, "Stop<WG3361> weeping;<WG2799> behold,<WG2400> the Lion<WG3023> that is from the tribe<WG5443> of Judah,<WG2455> the Root<WG4491> of David,<WG7035> has overcome<WG3528> so as to open<WG455> the book<WG975> and its seven<WG2033> seals.<WG4973>"

And I saw<WG3708> between<WG1722> <WG3319> the throne<WG2362> (with the four<WG5064> living<WG2226> creatures<WG2226>) and the elders<WG4245> a Lamb<WG721> standing,<WG2476> as if<WG5613> slain,<WG4969> having<WG2192> seven<WG2033> horns<WG2768> and seven<WG2033> eyes,<WG3788> which<WG3739> are the seven<WG2033> Spirits<WG4151> of God,<WG2316> sent<WG649> out into all<WG3956> the earth.<WG1093>
And He came,<WG2064> and He took<WG2983> [it] out of the right<WG1188> hand<WG1188> of Him who sat<WG2521> on the throne.<WG2362>

And when<WG3753> He had taken<WG2983> the book,<WG975> the four<WG5064> living<WG2226> creatures<WG2226> and the twenty-four elders<WG4245> fell<WG4098> down<WG4098> before<WG1799> the Lamb,<WG721> having<WG2192> each<WG1538> one<WG1538> a harp,<WG2788> and golden<WG5552> bowls<WG5357> full<WG1073> of incense,<WG2368> which<WG3739> are the prayers<WG4335> of the saints.<WG40>

And they sang<WG103> a new<WG2537> song,<WG5603> saying,<WG3004> "Worthy<WG514> art<WG1510> Thou to take<WG2983> the book,<WG975> and to break<WG455> its seals;<WG4973> for Thou wast slain,<WG4969> and didst purchase<WG59> for God<WG2316> with Thy blood<WG129> [men] from every<WG3956> tribe<WG5443> and tongue<WG1100> and people<WG2992> and nation.<WG1484>
"And Thou hast made<WG4160> them [to be] a kingdom<WG932> and priests<WG2409> to our God;<WG2316> and they will reign<WG936> upon the earth.<WG1093>"

And I looked,<WG3708> and I heard<WG191> the voice<WG5456> of many<WG4183> angels<WG32> around<WG2945> the throne<WG2362> and the living<WG2226> creatures<WG2226> and the elders;<WG4245> and the number<WG706> of them was myriads<WG3461> of myriads,<WG3461> and thousands<WG5505> of thousands,<WG5505>

saying<WG3004> with a loud<WG3173> voice,<WG5456> "Worthy<WG514> is the Lamb<WG721> that was slain<WG4969> to receive<WG2983> power<WG1411> and riches<WG4149> and wisdom<WG4678> and might<WG2479> and honor<WG5092> and glory<WG1391> and blessing.<WG2129>"

And every<WG3956> created<WG2938> thing<WG2938> which<WG3739> is in heaven<WG3772> and on the earth<WG1093> and under<WG5270> the earth<WG1093> and on the sea,<WG2281> and all<WG3956> things<WG3956> in them, I heard<WG191> saying,<WG3004> "To Him who sits<WG2521> on the throne,<WG2362> and to the Lamb,<WG721> [be] blessing<WG2129> and honor<WG5092> and glory<WG1391> and dominion<WG2904> forever<WG165> and ever.<WG165>"
And the four<WG5064> living<WG2226> creatures<WG2226> kept saying,<WG3004> "Amen.<WG281>" And the elders<WG4245> fell<WG4098> down<WG4098> and worshiped.<WG4352>
